tool_description:
An API to Generate Memorable URLs.
Shout Link makes it easier to share a URL with other people in a non-electronic way.
You can just "shout it" to your friend across the room, plus it leaves less room for potential typos.
name: Shout Link - URL Shortener
title: Shout Link - URL Shortener

api_list.name: Get a URL
api_list.description: Returns the original URL that was shortened

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The ID that you want to retrieve

optional_parameters.name: password
optional_parameters.description: The password used while shortening the URL

api_list.name: Shorten a URL
api_list.description: Returns a short memorable id (to be used while retrieving)

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: The original URL to be shortened

optional_parameters.name: password
optional_parameters.description: If entered, the same password would be required while retrieving the URL
